title: Introducing the new worker
creator_credit: Richard Massingham, Central Office of Information and Public Relations Films
brief_description: A film showing the importance of a thorough introduction being given to the new worker on their arrival at a factory, so that they understand the practical routine and can settle down satisfactorily. Correct and incorrect methods of induction are illustrated.
